title: Problems with League Of Legends client
body: Am I the only one who has a problems with League Of Legends client ? I mean every time I finish ranked game clien just break and then when I press something it just dissapears. Then I need alt+shift+esc to turn it off. {{item:3070}}  {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
This is the second time I've seen a similair report after a game has ended, so I'd like to do some troubleshooting to fixx this up.  As a first step, if you've recently updated Windows 10, disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been known to interact poorly with League.

If you are using any third party programs like play.tv or overwolf, remove them as unsupported apps can cause problems with the game.

Let me know how this works out for you!
